title: What will you serve for Memorial Day

content: I've been trying to make plans to get to my PGR's Mission, but it's not working out, so we've decided to grill Chicken and Kabobs. Gramma's making her famous and oh-so-awesome Potato Salad, and I'm making an American Flag cake I saw in a magazine.

content: Sounds great. You'll hear from him. My fdh went missing for a month at a time in Iraq. I worried. It all comes out great in the end. Now, Hubby and I are in Las Vegas at his exclusive loft townhouse. He's out doing something, gone missing in Vegas. Now I wonder. hmmmm. We're going out to see Lance Burton at the Flamingo or wherever tonight.

What will you serve for Memorial Day

content: On the “Barbie” will be prime rib eye steaks and grilled shrimp kabobs served with my special recipe of baked beans, mustard potato salad, creamed spinach, corn on the cob, and grilled asparagus. Cherry cobbler and chocolate lava cake w/ vanilla ice cream.
